Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Requires certain locations and venues maintain a supply of opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires nightlife establishments, sporting or event centers, theaters, concert venues, and amusement parks maintain a supply of opioid antagonists.
LawCode: Amd ยง3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain locations and venues maintain a supply of opioid antagonists
